alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:44PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Sangamon County through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Springfield, moving slowly. HAZARD...Heavy Rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding possible. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sherman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 90 and 104. Interstate 72 between mile markers 95 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
